name: hwpc-bug
description: hwpc site debugging with Playwright and Cucumber

scripts.test: npx cucumber-js -p runner & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:compiled: npm run build && npx cucumber-js -p compiled
scripts.test:api: npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags @api & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:navigation: npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags @navigation & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:navigation:mobile: npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags "@navigation and @mobile" & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:navigation:responsive: npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags "@navigation and @responsive" & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:navigation:performance: npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags "@navigation and @performance" & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.qa:test: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx cucumber-js -p runner & cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.qa:test:navigation: cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx cucumber-js -p runner --tags @navigation & cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_ENV=qa npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:isolated: cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx cucumber-js -p isolated & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:production: cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx cucumber-js -p production & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:dual: cross-env TEST_MODE=dual npx cucumber-js -p dual & cross-env TEST_MODE=dual npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=dual npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:isolated:navigation: cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx cucumber-js -p isolated --tags "@navigation and @isolated" & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:production:navigation: cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx cucumber-js -p production --tags "@navigation and @production" & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:isolated:api: cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx cucumber-js -p isolated --tags "@api and @isolated" & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=isolated npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts
scripts.test:production:api: cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx cucumber-js -p production --tags "@api and @production" & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/HTMLReporter.ts & cross-env TEST_MODE=production npx ts-node ./src/support/reporter/CucumberReporter.ts

author: Chris Trees
